title: How to Spot a Neeko
body:
as we all {{champion:518}} can change into any champion but some things are a give away for her. here is a few I have seen or that I assume:

{{champion:104}} doesn't reload after two shots.
{{champion:17}} doesn't apply poison to targets she hits.
{{champion:21}} doesn't apply Lovetap (need confirmation)
{{champion:51}} doesn't get Headshots (need confirmation)
{{champion:22}} doesn't apply Frost Shot (need confirmation)
{{champion:29}} doesn't apply Deadly Venom (need confirmation)
{{champion:115}} doesn't apply Short Fuse (need confirmation)
{{champion:41}} doesn't get Trial By Fire bonus damage (need confirmation)
{{champion:74}} doesn't get bonus movement near turrets (need confirmation)

replies.body:
Her passive is such a gimmick that it almost makes no sense to even use it mostly. I mean If I copy kayn and I am not going through a wall obviously its Neeko and not Kayn. I am glad they did it this way, because it could be so stupidly overpowered if it was too hard to guess who was Neeko.

plus if she is copying an ADC and she takes 20 AA's to kill a minion probably Neeko lol.
There is actually a whole [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlvPsAISSqM&t=102s) on neekos inconsistencies!
